headline: Another MSC-Hutchison Port Deal Heads Toward Antitrust Crosshairs
summary: The European Commission appears poised to investigate the carrier's bid for 50 percent of Hutchison’s Barcelona terminal, which is separate from the parties' $22.8 billion global ports deal.

headline: BlackRock turns bearish on long-term Treasuries as AI funding wave looms
summary: The BlackRock Investment Institute said on Tuesday it is turning bearish on long-term U.S. Treasuries, warning a coming wave ​of AI-related financing could put upward pressure on U.S. borrowing costs and exacerbate worries over ‌U.S. government indebtedness.  "Higher borrowing across public and private ⁠sectors is likely to keep upward pressure ‌on interest rates," BII, a division of U.S.-based BlackRock focused on investment research, said in a 2026 global investment outlook report.  "A structurally higher cost of capital raises the cost of AI-related investment and affects the broader economy," it said.

raw.headline: BlackRock turns bearish on long-term Treasuries as AI funding wave looms

"Higher borrowing across public and private ⁠sectors is likely to keep upward pressure ‌on interest rates," BII, a division of U.S.-based BlackRock focused on investment research, said in a 2026 global investment outlook report.  "A structurally higher cost of capital raises the cost of AI-related investment and affects the broader economy," it said.
